fulltext:
1 
LE QUANG PHAT 
Profile Summary 
Mobile Developer 
OVERVIEW  
Full Name: 
LE QUANG PHAT 
Gender:  Male 
Date of Birth: 
15-Jul-1994 
Nationality:   Vietnamese 
Address: 
317 Lot D, An Quang Apartment, Ward 9, District 10  
Phat is an iOS Developer with over 2 years’ experience in Mobile and Web development. 
Phat’s experience in development includes: 
 
Full Cycle Implementation projects – 3 mobile projects in FSOFT HCM. 
 
Strong technical knowledge – in all development techniques include: 
o Swift (1.2 – 4.x). 
o 
JavaScript & Angular. 
o 
Ionic v1, v3. 
o 
React native 
o 
PHP 
SUMMARY OF EXPERIENCE  
Sep 2017 – Jul 2019 
FSOFT HCM 
Mobile Developer 
Jun 2015 – Sep 2015 
TMA Solution 
Internship 
DETAILS OF EXPERIENCE  
Sep 2016 – Jul 2019 
FPT SOFTWARE 
Mobile Developer 
 
Nov 2018 – Jun 2019 
Mobile Developer for PPUPI Project 
- PPUPI Mobile is upgraded project from PET-Unify-Mobile with new technical and add more 
modules. 
- Role: member. 
- Main techniques used: React Native 
 
May 2018 – Oct 2018 
Mobile Developer for EBC Project 
- EBC is an application support customer to manage and track working schedule of employee 
- Role: member. 
- Main techniques used: Ionic v3, Angular 5, HTML, CSS. 
 
Sep 2017 – March 2018 
Mobile Developer for PET-UNIFY-MOBILE Project 
- This is an application support customer to move from manual paper based process into digital and 
mobile technology to manage Oil Refinery Operation processes. 
- Role: member. 
- Main techniques used: Ionic v1, AngularJS, JavaScript, HTML, CSS. 
 
April 2017 – Aug 2017 
iOS Developer for Healthy Care Project 
- This app reads your health and fitness data from Health app and helps you keep track of your 
progress. 
- Role: member (maintenance). 
- Main techniques used: Swift 3. 
 
Jan 2017 – March 2017 
iOS Developer for eManagement Project 
- Develop mobile application to help operation staff and engineers to perform their management tasks 
effectively and efficiently. Provide intuitive and engaging UI/UX for users to check reference material 
including documents and video, while updating their jobs status in real-time. 
- Role : member 
- Main techniques used: Swift 3. 
2 
Jun 2015 – Sep 2015 
TMA SOLUTIONS 
Android Developer Internship in Indoor Location Project 
- Develop application that draws map of indoor buildings by using smart phone while walking. 
- Role: member. 
- Main technical used: Android, Java. 
EDUCATION  
- Software Engineer, University of Science 
2016 
SKILLS  
Development, Design Tools: 
 
Editor: Visual Studio, Xcode 
 
Source control: TFS, GIT. 
Expertise: 
 
Strong networking, core data in iOS. 
 
Experience in iOS programing such as Autolayout programing, customize component, multi-thread. 
Foreign Languages: 
 
English Skill: reading and writing proficiency, listening and speaking normally 
Soft skills: 
 
Strong ability to learn or catch up new technologies. 
 
Easily adapting to new surroundings and conditions. 
 
Familiar with Scrum process. 
 
Good self management, team work spirit. 
 
Good documentation skills. 
3
